REUTERS.UNKNOWN: Y f2469 reute r f BC-ATLANTIC-TO-RAISE-HIG 04-01 0093

TEXT.TITLE: ATLANTIC TO RAISE HIGH SULPHUR FUEL PRICES
TEXT.BODY: Atlantic Fuels Marketing Corp said today it will raise the posted cargo prices for high sulphur fuels in New York Harbor 50 to 75 cts per barrel, effective April two. The increase brings the prices for two pct sulphur to 19.25 dlrs, up 50 cts, 2.2 pct sulphur to 18.75 dlrs, up 50 cts, 2.5 pct sulphur to 18.50 dlrs, up 50 cts, 2.8 pct sulphur to 18.25 dlrs, up 75 cts, the company said. Posted prices for 0.3 pct and one pct low sulphur fuels were unchanged at 22 and 20 dlrs, it said. Reuter
